query: INSERT INTO AnimalTemperaments (animalId, temperamentId, createdAt, updatedAt) SELECT a.id, t.id, NOW(), NOW() FROM Animals a CROSS JOIN Temperaments t WHERE (a.name = 'Coco' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Species s WHERE s.id = a.speciesId AND s.name = 'Dwarf Hamster' ) AND t.name IN ('Calm', 'Scared')) OR (a.name = 'Ted' AND t.name IN ('Calm', 'Scared')) OR (a.name = 'Coco' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Species s WHERE s.id = a.speciesId AND s.name = 'Jack-Russel' ) AND t.name = 'Energetic') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updatedAt = VALUES(updatedAt);
